name: villains-microservice
description: Just a small project to learn about microservices and containerizing them via Docker

scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && node_modules/.bin/webpack --env development --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && node_modules/.bin/webpack --env production --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=development node build/villains.app.js
scripts.start: npm run build:production && NODE_ENV=production node build/villains.app.js

author: JV Estolas
